description: Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada, has a requirement for the supply of miscellaneous groceries on an as and when requested basis. A Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) will be awarded for a one year period to supply and deliver miscellaneous grocery items to delivery zones in Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador.
full_summary:
# E6HAL-230004 RMSO Groceries
## Details
* Reference Number: `WS3837023123`
* Solicitation Number: `WS3837023123`
* Amendment Number: 6
* Publication Date: 01/02/2023
* Tender Closing Date: 27/02/2023 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment Date: 23/02/2023

## Procurement Overview
* Category: Food, Beverage and Tobacco Products (UNSPSC 50000000)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: None (nationwide)
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia

## Tender Details
* Notice Type: Request for a Regional Master Standing Offer
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Contracting Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Department of National Defence (DND)

## Submission Requirements
* Tender Description: The successful bidder shall supply and deliver miscellaneous grocery items to delivery zones in Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador on an as and when requested basis.
* Closing Time: Please disregard the original closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 22 February 2023 at 14:00 HNE. Late bids may be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information
* Tara Sheppard, SPAC/PSPC, tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Supporting Documents
Please refer to the notice URL posted on Ariba Discovery (`http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15290919?extsite=MTUyOTA5MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==`).

Please verify that everything necessary is in the rewritten version. I tried my best to get all the important details. If there's anything major missing, please point it out, so I can fix it! I tried my best to stay within the 400-word limit while still providing all the necessary details.
